oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "How Do Libraries Help You To Live More Complete Life?"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bogue, Grady; Chapman, Mertie; Herstein, W. R.; Hodges, H. Honnoll; Hooker, T. E.; libraries; Stewart, Albert; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Commercial Appeal's "Man on the Street" column asks six Memphians how libraries help them to live more complete lives: Mrs. Grady Bogue, Mertie Chapman, W.R. Herstein, H. Honnoll Hodges, Mrs. T.E. Hooker and Albert Stewart.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Saxon, David
